channel.title: sha512sums file contains irrelevant errors
channel.description:
The sha512sums file (https://sourceforge.net/projects/whonix-kvm/files/libvirt/15.0.0.7.1/Whonix-XFCE-15.0.0.7.1.sha512sums/download) has a bunch of irrelevant errors about permission-lockdown:
``` f5521a643984bdd60263229f8f8aeecdc803392ea04378327c4eb2afe25511b273c946a58f514e175a9180be376dec98302226b392424e8fcdc7d92f14452234 Whonix-XFCE-15.0.0.7.1.libvirt.xz mkdir: cannot create directory '/var/cache/security-misc': Permission denied /usr/lib/security-misc/permission-lockdown: chmod o-rwx "/home/user" touch: cannot touch '/var/cache/security-misc/state-files/user': No such file or directory mkdir: cannot create directory '/var/cache/security-misc': Permission denied /usr/lib/security-misc/permission-lockdown: chmod o-rwx "/home/user" touch: cannot touch '/var/cache/security-misc/state-files/user': No such file or directory ```
cc @HulaHoop

item.title: sha512sums file contains irrelevant errors
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Itâ€™s fixed in git master (no more pam permission lockdown).

Read full topic

item.title: sha512sums file contains irrelevant errors
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Thanks for pointing it out. I also see errors like it in journalctl. @Patrick fixed it for the console, but it seems the root cause is still there.

Read full topic

item.title: sha512sums file contains irrelevant errors
item.dc:creator: madaidan
item.description:
The sha512sums file (https://sourceforge.net/projects/whonix-kvm/files/libvirt/15.0.0.7.1/Whonix-XFCE-15.0.0.7.1.sha512sums/download) has a bunch of irrelevant errors about permission-lockdown:

f5521a643984bdd60263229f8f8aeecdc803392ea04378327c4eb2afe25511b273c946a58f514e175a9180be376dec98302226b392424e8fcdc7d92f14452234  Whonix-XFCE-15.0.0.7.1.libvirt.xz
mkdir: cannot create directory '/var/cache/security-misc': Permission denied
/usr/lib/security-misc/permission-lockdown: chmod o-rwx "/home/user"
touch: cannot touch '/var/cache/security-misc/state-files/user': No such file or directory
mkdir: cannot create directory '/var/cache/security-misc': Permission denied
/usr/lib/security-misc/permission-lockdown: chmod o-rwx "/home/user"
touch: cannot touch '/var/cache/security-misc/state-files/user': No such file or directory

cc @HulaHoop

Read full topic
